title: TEDxKPRIT 2025
tagline: Break The Loop - Unlooped Unbound Unstoppable
description: TEDxKPRIT brings together visionary speakers, artists, and innovators to ignite curiosity, challenge perspectives, and inspire action. 'Break The Loop' is a call to disrupt the expected, to challenge cycles of habit, systems of thought, and stories we've outgrown. Whether in technology, culture, or personal growth — this theme invites bold thinking that breaks away from inertia and builds anew.
location: Kommuri Pratap Reddy Institute of Technology, Hyderabad

tickets.name: Regular Pass
tickets.description: Full day access to TEDxKPRIT 2025 with swag kit
perks: Full day access to all 12 speakers

speakers.name: Hema Thakur
speakers.title: Academic Editing | Research Mentorship | Author | Speaker
speakers.bio: I am an academic editor, mentor, and author with nearly a decade of experience helping researchers worldwide navigate the complexities of scholarly publishing. My work has been featured in leading news platforms like The Times of India, Zee Business, Ahmedabad Mirror, and Mid-Day, as well as scholarly forums such as Editage Insights, Scholarly Kitchen, and Rising Scholars.

speakers.name: Dr. Deepak J. Mashru
speakers.title: Visionary educator and pioneer in forensic linguistics
speakers.designation: Asst. Professor, National Forensic Sciences University
speakers.bio: With over two decades of transformative work, he has redefined how language, law, and technology converge to strengthen justice delivery. Honoured with national awards for teaching and pedagogical innovation, he is known for blending Bharatiya knowledge traditions with cutting-edge forensic applications. A director of a prestigious ICSSR project, he stands at the forefront of designing new educational and investigative frontiers.

speakers.name: Dr. Ravi Dasari
speakers.title: President and Group Head-HR of Jasper Industries Pvt Limited
speakers.bio: Dr. Ravi Dasari, President and Group Head – HR at Jasper Industries, has over 25 years of leadership experience with firms like NCC, IDBI, and Lanco. A PhD holder in HRM and university topper, he serves as Secretary of NHRD Hyderabad and is a certified executive coach. He has authored 30+ research papers, led programs at IIMs and ASCI, and specializes in organizational culture, leadership, and knowledge worker management.

speakers.name: Dr. SaiRam Atluri
speakers.title: Internationally recognized stem cell specialist
speakers.bio: During the COVID-19 pandemic, Dr. Sairam published the first U.S. article (second in the World) on the use of stem cells in patients unresponsive to conventional therapies. His contributions to regenerative medicine have been recognized with multiple prestigious awards, including the Manchikanti Award and the Raj Excellence Award from the American Society of Interventional Pain Physicians. He is also a regular invited speaker at leading international stem cell conferences.

speakers.name: Rohit Tiwari
speakers.title: Sr. Director, DEXIAN India
speakers.bio: Rohit Tiwari is the Senior Director of Sales & Marketing at Dexian India, bringing over 17 years of expertise in client engagement, digital transformation, and business growth. At Dexian, he drives client success, managed services, and long-term partnerships, enabling enterprises to accelerate digital initiatives with measurable impact. His career journey spans leading firms like Capco, Quess Corp, Allegis Group, and Collabera, where he has steered portfolio growth.

speakers.name: Dr. Divya Raj
speakers.title: MD Pediatrics and Managing Director of the Neo Institute of Medical Sciences
speakers.designation: MD, Neo Institute of Medical Sciences
speakers.bio: Responding to the NMC Alert Note, she launched the first Indian-equivalent MBBS program in Uzbekistan's Tashkent region with GSL and Impuls Medical Institute. This program offers an NMC-aligned CBME curriculum, Indian faculty-led teaching, dual clinical exposure, a paid internship, FMGE/NeXT preparation from Year 1, and free PG pathways to the USA, UK, Australia, and Germany.

speakers.name: Dr. A M Reddy
speakers.title: Pioneering homeopathic physician, entrepreneur, and founder of the Positive Group of Clinics
speakers.bio: Dr. A. M. Reddy is a renowned homeopathic physician and entrepreneur, serving as the Founder and Managing Director of Dr. Positive Health Sciences and Dr. Care Homeopathy Group, which run leading clinic chains across India. He earned his BHMS degree from Gulbarga University in 2002. With over two decades of experience, Dr. Reddy has pioneered specialized homeopathic treatments for Autism Spectrum Disorders (ASD) and holistic healthcare.

speakers.name: Ramya Parashar
speakers.title: Chief Operating Officer at MiQ's Bangalore Center of Excellence
speakers.designation: COO, MiQ's Bangalore Center of Excellence
speakers.bio: Coming from a non-technical background, she has redefined leadership in tech-heavy domains by embracing discomfort, risk, and continuous learning. Recognized among Forbes India's W-Power: Self-made Women and AIM's Top 25 GCC Heads for two consecutive years, she is celebrated for blending data-driven systems with people-centric leadership. At MiQ, she champions inclusive workplaces, innovation, and empowerment, inspiring teams to transform challenges into opportunities.

speakers.name: Nithya Rajendran
speakers.title: Indian Classical vocalist, trained in both Hindustani and Carnatic traditions
speakers.bio: She is the founder of Music Vruksh, an initiative that explores the healing and mood-elevating powers of classical music through concerts, workshops, and classes. A multiple-time TEDx speaker, including at IIT Jodhpur. Nithya bridges tradition with contemporary relevance. Her work has been featured in Outlook, The Week, CNBC TV18, India Today TV, Thrive Global, and more. She also writes on music and wellness, and has been recognized among "Women in Music" achievers by The Score Magazine.

speakers.name: Sreekanth Erepalli
speakers.title: Founder and Managing Director
speakers.bio: Sreekanth Erepalli, Founder of Giosun Healthcare Pvt. Ltd., is a global advocate for modern Ayurveda. With 30+ years in Ayurveda and herbal wellness, he blends traditional wisdom with science to develop certified formulations for conditions like migraines, arthritis, and thyroid issues. Since 2014, his mission has been to make Ayurveda accessible, evidence-based, and globally respected.

speakers.name: Vishal Raj
speakers.title: Environmental Leader | Entrepreneur | Climate Action Advocate
speakers.bio: Founder and Chairman of the Environment Conserving Organisation (E.C.O). Starting his environmental journey at the age of 14, Vishal officially established E.C.O. in 2014, transforming it from a small student eco-club into one of India's most dynamic youth-led environmental NGOs. With a professional background as a SAP FICO Consultant at Accenture for five years, he now leads Mohan Raj Co. as its Managing Director, focusing on building sustainable alternatives and climate-conscious businesses.

speakers.name: Swetaa Varma
speakers.title: Tollywood Actress | Rider | Writer
speakers.bio: Swetaa Varma is an Indian actor and storyteller from Hyderabad. Known for her dynamic performances across film and television, her notable works include Pachchis (2021), Raani on Aha, Good Luck Sakhi alongside Keerthy Suresh on Prime Video, Operation Valentine (2024), and S-99 (2024). She has also appeared in Gaali and Three Half Bottles, and gained widespread recognition as a contestant on Bigg Boss Telugu Season 5, where she stayed for six weeks.

speakers.name: Tajdar Ali
speakers.title: We Hub
speakers.bio: Mr. Shaik Mohammed Tajdar Ali Taj is a dynamic Program Manager for Social Impact & Entrepreneurship at WE Hub Foundation, Govt. of Telangana. With a strong background in program strategy, partnerships, and ecosystem development, he has impacted over 5000 students and supported 100+ startups. A Mentor of Change (NITI Aayog), he advocates for inclusive policies and cross-border collaborations. His vision focuses on innovation-led growth, public-private partnerships, and empowering underrepresented communities.

speakers.name: Rakesh Kurapati
speakers.title: Founder, Fast Tracks Car Care
speakers.bio: Meet Rakesh Kurapati, the visionary Founder of Fast Tracks Car Care! With his entrepreneurial spirit, Rakesh is transforming the way we look at car care — bringing together innovation, trust, and customer-first solutions. From building a brand that stands for quality and reliability to inspiring a new wave of service excellence, his journey reflects passion, resilience, and big-picture thinking.

highlights: Theme: Break The Loop - Disruption, Awareness, Breakthrough
Full day event with lunch and coffee breaks
Ideas worth spreading - TED license event

pillars.name: Disruption
pillars.description: Question the status quo. Reimagine what's possible when routines are interrupted with intent.

pillars.name: Awareness
pillars.description: Recognize the loops — social, emotional, systemic — that shape our lives and limit our thinking.

pillars.name: Breakthrough
pillars.description: Step into the unknown. Growth often begins the moment you exit the cycle.

additionalInfo.munDescription: Special Model United Nations experience curated alongside TEDxKPRIT. Build policy, exchange perspectives, and practice consensus-building.
